short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: View Screenshare in full screen on Google Meet

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows you to view ScreenShare in Full Screen on Google Meet. 

Features:
- There are two modes: Default and Full. 
  In Default mode, you still have access to built-in Google Meet functionalities such as emoji, side bar actions.  In Full mode, the screen is stretched in maximum size.
- It is responsive when you use built-in Google Meet functionalities. 
- It is compatible with built-in Browser Full Screen.
- Use "Meta" key + "F" ( Windows key + F or Command key + F ) to toggle and Esc to reset the full-screen.
